Fast Food Restaurant Franchise Franchise Name Vanellis Main Category Fast Food Investment Required $100,001 - $200,000
History
Since 1981, Vanellis has been serving fresh Italian food across Canada. In 1995, Vanellis opened its first unit in Bahrain and was an instant international success. As part of the MTY Group, Vanellis has now grown to over 110 units worldwide and will continue to grow and expand to meet our customers’ needs.
At Vanellis, our priority is to offer our customers the freshest and healthiest ingredients. We carefully monitor the quality of our products and always challenge ourselves to improve.
Our Concept
Vanellis is constantly evolving to stay ahead of the rapidly changing quick service industry. We only purchase our products from the most reputable suppliers and never settle for anything less.
For many years, we have been serving traditional pizzas and pastas. Recently, we have added a selection of gourmet pastas and pizzas to our menu. Our pastas are always freshly prepared in front of our customers, allowing them to select the appropriate ingredients that meet their nutritional and dietary needs. We enjoy having our customers involved in making their nutritional choices. This also ensures that the food is fresh and hot!
Become a Franchise Team Partner and Grow with Us!
Vanellis is a highly successful fast food chain dedicated to offering fresh Italian food to today’s fast-paced, health-conscious lifestyle.
We are focused on expanding our network of franchises without compromising our dedication to giving consumers a fast and freshly-prepared meal at an affordable price.
Vanellis awards its valued franchise opportunity to preferred franchisees and licensees who pass a rigorous three stage interview and examination process. Preferred candidates are selected on the basis of several criteria including; business acumen and experience, financial viability, character and attitude, effective learning and communications skills and more.
As part of the Vanellis family, you will benefit from the experience of our dynamic Vanellis team.
We provide to all our stores the necessary tools for success.
Delicious and Healthy Recipes Training and Operation Support Purchasing Power Established Advertising&Marketing Strategies
The Franchise Process
Vanellis is dedicated to helping you through the entire franchising process – from site selection, to training and to marketing support.
Site Selection
Location, Location, Location. Location is key to a successful business. At Vanellis, we have a rigorous site selection process to ensure that each location is strategically located to provide maximum visibility, traffic and of the appropriate size.
Training
Upon the grand opening of your store, Vanellis enlists each new franchisee in 2 weeks of training. Our training includes:
Food preparation and handling methods – we will teach you, step by step everything you need to know to prepare all the items on our menu – from pizza dough handling to cooking every one of Vanellis’ signature pasta dishes. Purchasing – we provide you all the tools and information to streamline your purchases and ensure that you benefit from our collective purchasing power Staffing – we will lend a hand in making sure that you hire appropriate staff for your restaurant.
We will also supply you with the “Vanellis Operations Manual” which is a comprehensive guide to successfully operate your business. We are there for you every step of the way!
Marketing Support
When you join the Vanellis family, you become part of an organization with tremendous advertising, business coaching and marketing support. We have a team of highly experience marketing experts whose main priority is to provide excellent marketing for Vanellis.
Are You Ready?
The experience and know-how that have made Vanellis franchises so successful can be yours! The Vanellis team would love to hear from you and be happy to answer any questions you may have. You can reach us by simply filling out the forms below.
For more information complete the form to the right.
